definition: to do/to make/to go in for/to set up/to get hold of/to take care of

sentences.english: You will be able to enliven your site in the direct meaning of this word.
sentences.chinese: 你将能够搞活您网站中的直接意义，这两个字。

sentences.english: To enliven our economy, we should support the legal individual trade.
sentences.chinese: 要搞活经济就要扶持正当的个体贸易。

sentences.english: To sell is one of the method to relive the State-owned enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 搞活国有企业的形式多样，出售是其中的一种方式。

sentences.english: The paper also probes profitably the problem of vivifying the state enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 对如何搞活国营企业的问题作了有益的探讨。

sentences.english: The flat, pastel pictures add enlivening details to the repetitive text.
sentences.chinese: 平坦的，柔和的图片添加搞活细节的重复文本。

sentences.english: To enliven rural economy, market space for agricultural products must be expanded.
sentences.chinese: 当前，要搞活农村经济，必须拓宽农产品市场空间。

sentences.english: Opening up and enliven the secondary housing market.
sentences.chinese: 开放和搞活住房二级市场的目标。

sentences.english: Actively promote the restructuring of the grain distribution system to activate the circulation of farm products.
sentences.chinese: 积极推进粮食流通体制改革，搞活农产品流通。

sentences.english: And I enliven whom I will.
We should continue to relax control over and invigorate small state-owned enterprises in various ways.
sentences.chinese: 继续采取多种形式放开搞活国有小企业。

sentences.english: Getting the factory going in these hard times is almost impossible.
sentences.chinese: 在这个困难时期，想把这家工厂搞活几乎是不可能的。

sentences.english: I enjoyed the challenge, and I got pretty good at it.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这个挑战，后来变得对搞活经济非常在行。

sentences.english: Contracted responsibility system is an effective system at present for invigorating the enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 承包责任制是现阶段搞活企业的有效形式。

sentences.english: Relax price control, enliven the market.
Continue to invigorate small State-owned enterprises with an relax control over them.
sentences.chinese: 继续采取多种形式放开搞活国有小企业。

definition: to do well at/to do a good job
to do/to make/to go in for/to set up/to get hold of/to take care of
to expand production/to reproduce on an extended scale
public sector of economy/state run enterprises
state monopoly of purchasing and marketing
stable prices/commodity prices fixed by government (in a command economy)/to valorize (a commodity)
rural household contract responsibility system, PRC government policy linking rural income to productivity
pinyin: nong2 cun1 jia1 ting2 lian2 chan3 cheng2 bao1 ze2 ren4 zhi4
related.word: 农村家庭联产承包责任制

definition: Zhengxing district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning
